SELECT contest_user.uid, contest_user.submit_times, contest_user.ac_times, contest_user.finished_problems, contest_user.total_score, contest_user.total_used_time,
user.nickname
group_user.group_name as nickname
FROM contest_user
LEFT JOIN user ON contest_user.uid = user.uid
LEFT JOIN group_user ON contest_user.uid = group_user.uid
WHERE cid = #{cid} AND contest_user.uid != #{except}
AND group_user.gid=#{gid}
ORDER BY total_score DESC , total_used_time ASC

SELECT contest_user.uid, contest_user.submit_times, contest_user.ac_times, contest_user.finished_problems, contest_user.total_score, contest_user.total_used_time, contest_user.total_wrong_times, total_wrong_times * 60 * 1000 * #{penalty} AS penalty_time,
user.nickname
group_user.group_name as nickname
FROM contest_user
LEFT JOIN user ON contest_user.uid = user.uid
LEFT JOIN group_user ON contest_user.uid = group_user.uid
WHERE contest_user.cid = #{cid} AND contest_user.uid != #{except}
AND group_user.gid=#{gid}
ORDER BY total_score DESC , (total_used_time + penalty_time) ASC
